title: Elections Open Line - You Weigh In
teaser: Just this morning the Marquette Law School released its final poll before the election: Among likely voters, Walker leads 50 percent to 43 percent. Among registered voters, Walker leads Burke by 1 point, 46 percent to 45 percent. This hour we want to hear from you. Who's your candidate and why? What is inspiring you to the polls in the midterm elections? Perhaps you don't plan to vote. We'd like to know why. 1-800-486-8655.
